title: ➤Amazing 1 Bed by Porter Square! Parking Included! Ava. Now!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 301542163', 'Rent: $4,000 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 07/15/2022', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Rent Includes:: Garbage, Gas, Heat', 'Parking:: attached garage', 'Luxurious 1 bed/1 bath in Cambridge right by Porter Square is now available!', 'Located right by lots of shops, restaurants, and nightlife in Porter Square!', 'Moments away from Davis Square and Harvard Square as well!', 'Easy access to public transportation with a T stop close by.', 'This unit features:', '-Hardwood floors', '-Sunny rooms', '-Great common roof deck', '-Updated kitchen and bathroom', '-Huge closet space', '-Laundry in unit', 'Pet friendly with one garage parking spot included!', 'Garbage, gas, and heat also included!', 'Owner will pay 50% of the broker fee!', 'Reach out now to schedule a showing, units do not last in this market!', 'Please email Terry to schedule a showing and get more info on this unit and other apartment options!', 'Email: Terry @ benjaminapartments .', 'com (Remove the spaces)', 'Search Boston’s largest selection of apartments at https://ygl.is/terry-zhu-agent', 'Nearby transportation:', 'Bus: 77 Massachusetts Ave @ Davenport St (0.12 mi)', 'Bus: 87 Elm St @ Beech St (0.09 mi)', 'Bus: 83 Massachusetts Ave opp Beech St (0.07 mi)', 'Subway: Red Line Porter (0.19 mi)', 'Rail: Fitchburg Line Porter (0.19 mi)', 'Bus: 88 Highland Ave @ Willow Ave (0.29 mi)', 'Bus: 96 College Ave @ Highland Ave (0.41 mi)', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
